lines.text: What chance have we got when the shooting starts?
We'll have as good a chance as Quirt had.
Sure and look what happened to him! A man that would get himself killed to prove a point has got a mule beat for stubbornness.
The bolder the outlaw, the more brazan his actions.
Hey! Come back here and I'll orphan your children and widow your wife!
You know, Hoppy, sometimes I wish I was a cow.
Well, they always seem to be standin' knee deep in somethin' tuh eat.

[after doing a take]
You don't get it?
